page.title: 04GREENOCK CONTAINER TERMINAL
page.content: THE CONTAINER TERMINAL IS SITUATED AT PRINCES PIER. IT IS DIRECTLY ACROSS THE RIVER CLYDE FROM HELENSBURGH. IT IS A PLACE WHERE CONTAINER SHIPS COME AND UNLOAD THEIR GOODS. BOATS COME FROM COUNTRIES SUCH AS GERMANY, RUSSIA AND GREECE. NOT SO MANY SHIPS COME TO THE CONTAINER TERMINAL AS BEFORE AND THERE IS EVEN TALK OF CLOSING IT DOWN. THERE ARE LARGE STRADDLE CARRIERS THAT TAKE THE CONTAINERS FROM ONE PART OF THE TERMINAL TO ANOTHER. LORRIES ARE OFTEN SEEN LEAVING THE CONTAINER TERMINAL TAKING LOADS TO FIRMS IN GREENOCK AND OTHER TOWNS. SOMETIMES PART OF THE TERMINAL IS PACKED WITH CONTAINERS, AND THEN NEXT DAY IT IS ALMOST EMPTY ONCE A SHIP HAS BEEN LOADED.
